- Topic: Motion to amend the Holiday schedule for City Government for the year 2021
- Summary: Motion to add Juneteenth as an additional holiday for City Government on June 18, 2021.
- Ordinance Number: M-21-217
- Votes Summary:
    - Vote 1: Motion to Suspend the Rules - Passed - (6 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 1 ABSENT)
    - Vote 2: Motion to Adopt - Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The motion to amend the Holiday schedule for City Government for the year 2021 to include Juneteenth as an additional holiday was adopted.
- Tags/Keywords: Holiday schedule, Juneteenth, City Government, M-21-217
- UID: 255919ae-d1a6-4f3e-bfd5-6179f7109ca7

- Topic: Motion to establish Crisis Intervention Strategy Task Force

- Ordinance Number: M-21-214
- Votes Summary:
    - Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The advisory task force, known as the Crisis Intervention Strategy Task Force, will consist of 13 members appointed by different entities and will focus on policing alternatives, crisis response, and intervention strategies.
